scripts.test: echo testing...&& cd test && ts-node ../node_modules/blue-tape/bin/blue-tape "**/*.ts" | tap-spec
scripts.source-test: echo source-testing... && cd source-test && mocha --require ts-node/register "**/*.ts"
scripts.publish: npm -s run lint+build+test && echo publish to typings/registry
scripts.build+test: npm run build && npm run test-all
scripts.lint+build+test: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test-all
